text: @Ilkleybrewery Hi. Do you guys deliver to Chester?

text: This 7.5% juniper and hemp IPA is just stunning @HawksheadBrewer and we've got a few. Just £10 for 3 and we deliver. http://t.co/gLEE97pcmg
